column4: Hey i have bought a Wireless adapter and lsusb finds it OK.. BUT the howto- http://www.ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-92327.html - did not work for me..  Ubuntu 6.04 with all updates so far.
It did not make the file while i wrote: sudo make
6.04 (actually 6-06 now)  is the development version of ubuntu.  Its name is dapper.  The room for dapper discussion is #ubuntu+1, just type: /join #ubuntu+1
